pages.text: $(mod)Wireless Chargers$() adds some machines to $(info)wirelessly charge nearby machines and player inventories$().

pages.title: Block Chargers
pages.text: The $(item)Wireless Block Chargers$() will charge nearby machines with FE. The Advanced one charges faster and in a wider range.

pages.title: Player Chargers
pages.text: The $(item)Wireless Player Chargers$() will charge the items in nearby players' inventories. The Advanced one charges faster and in a wider range.
